website_summaries.verdict: A heavyweight and well-crafted item that is ideal for any enthusiast of Lloyd Webber's 'Phantom of The Opera.
pros: This ornate hand-sculpted and hand-painted music box is very striking to look at
Wind-up music box contains the tune of 'Masquerade.'
And we love that when this box plays, the monkey will hit its cymbals together
cons: Users report that the wind-up mechanism is awkwardly placed underneath

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS FOR YOUR LOVED ONE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother's day gift to my mom. She opened it and cried! The box it came in was amazing and had the phantom mask and writing on it. The music box is the perfect size and sounds beautiful. The arms/cymbals work beautifully too. Highly recommend if you’re a Phantom fan
customer_reviews.author: Steven/Alex

customer_reviews.title: Monkey on my back.
customer_reviews.text: The Phantom has had a special place in my marriage memories and my husband commented that, "wouldn't it be fun to have that music box?", the last time we watched the production. I knew that I could find it and by using Amazon, I did! My husband was in tears when he received this for Christmas from me. Good job all around. The quality is nice and the music is true and clear. We will keep it on a library shelf always.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: My dad loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves the Phantom of the Opera, so I got him this for Father's Day. He loved it! It's very nice and the music sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: B Grad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on my moms account for my bf for Valentine’s Day and he absolutely loves it! The music is so relaxing to listen to and it’s such so beautiful! Such a great product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerShauna Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: with really beautiful details. Would have loved for the cymbals to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a delightful piece indeed, with really beautiful details. Would have loved for the cymbals to be made of metal so they'd clang in tune to "Masquerade", but that's just me being picky. Bough it as a gift and have already ordered a new one for myself. A must for any Phantom of the Opera fan. Really happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: My family of Phantom Fanatics loved this replica
customer_reviews.text: My family of Phantom Fanatics loved this replica. I would have liked it to have a bit more of an excerpt from Masquerade. The movement of the cymbals is very slow - one cycle per cycle of the excerpt. Also, the wind up gets you ~4 cycles of the excerpt. Having said all that, we do enjoy the music box.
customer_reviews.author: J. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good craftsmanship and detail
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than what it seemed on the photo but it's still a nice piece with excellent quality and attention to detail. The song is beautiful and my 1 1/2 year old daughter is entranced by it haha.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Rigdon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Improperly named. So it was tricky to find but I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kindwall

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just a beautiful music box, although the monkey isn't that pretty, but it's a monkey... LOL. I just love this music box. The song plays out without missing a note and the quality of the entire unit is really detailed. The arms do work, but in a gentle fashion. That's fine as any sounds of symbols clanging would take away from the beauty of the music box. I'm really glad I got it. It is a wonderful addition to my shadow box with all my masquerade masks....
customer_reviews.author: D. N.

customer_reviews.title: Scary eyes
customer_reviews.text: The music box is very well-built but the eyes of the monkey on top of the box doesn't match the picture and doesn't match the movie. The sound is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: KeithandShilloy

customer_reviews.title: looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my son for Christmas. He is a big Phantom fan, and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: happy amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy box for phantom aficionados
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy box for phantom aficionados. Given the low cost of the movements, I with they would invest more on the outside of the box to give it a true antique feel rather than have it look and feel like a souvenir.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Alvaro Goyanes

customer_reviews.title: This is so cute. I was at the show ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. I was at the show and about to buy this music box for $85 until I checked Amazon and saw it for $60. However, it is still kind of expensive for what it does, but I thought that it was worth it as a souvenir from the show.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for another . . .
customer_reviews.text: I was initially asked to help purchase this item by a friend of mine for a mutual friend (he couldn't afford it by himself). I wasn't there during the gift opening, but I'm told she was very pleased. The item was mailed to me initially, and upon cursory inspection I was delighted to find that it was manufactured by the San Francisco Music Box Company, who make very fine crafted products. We used to have one of their outlet stores here in Grand Rapids, MI, but alas, no more.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Lieverdink

customer_reviews.title: just like movie
customer_reviews.text: looks exactly like music box from the movie, and plays the same song. my daughter is a big fan of Phantom of the Opera and loved it

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Music box from the San Francisco company and I feel like I need to complete the phantom of the opera collection right away .

The only things I didn't like was that the monkey isn't fuzzy and the cymbals aren't actually metal cymbals like the "real" movie music box. Despite that, my wife loves it and the music sounds great.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A collectors piece indeed, every detail exactly how she said. Will you still play when all the rest of us are dead? My whole family are all huge phantom of the opera fans. I was so excited when I finally bought it. The moment it came my dad tore it open without even telling me it came. We both watched it play. It is wonderful! The sound alone! Yet my dad still insists it should be in his room on his dresser it remains on mine and I turn it whenever I enter or start on my homework. It is truly a masterpiece!

customer_reviews.title: The pictures look nice I suppose
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a birthday gift for my significant other and just received mine it the mail not twenty minutes ago. My first thought was that there was no way I could give this as a gift. It seems very poorly made, and despite being described as a "music box" there is no way to actually open it. It's just a hunk of plastic. The tune that comes out is most certainly Masquerade, but it sounds fragile and weak. Now I've got to scramble to try and find another gift because this item is simply terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Eh.

customer_reviews.title: Fab size. Amazing detail
customer_reviews.text: Love life monkeys, but am not into model ones, but this particular one based on The Phantom of the Opera; my all-time favourite play, is unique n oh so Very special. He traveled all the way from the States to my hometown in the UK n, b'cs he was snuggly wrapped up warm n tight, he arrived safely happy. Now he's sitting all content, just like a good boy, displayed on-top of my display cabinet in the lounge. Has a key that you wind up to play The music n whilst playing he's busy clanging the tamborine Everyone admires him
customer_reviews.author: (~˘▾˘)~cherubEagleEyes♿️

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for a "Phantom Fan"!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this figurine/music box for someone who is a major Phantom of the Opera fan. It arrived well before the estimated date given, and was professionally packaged to ensure it's safe arrival. When I opened the box to inspect my purchase, I was impressed beyond measure, by the craftsmanship and detail. This is an exact replica of the prop used in theatrical productions. Not a detail is missed, up to and including the song chosen for the music box. I couldn't be happier with my purchase and I can't wait to see the reaction of it's recipient on Christmas morning. If you know a Phantom fan, look no further for the perfect gift. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Greedyreader

product_meta.title: The San Francisco Music Box Company Phantom of The Opera Musical Monkey Figurine
product_meta.description:
“Will you still play, even when the rest of us are dead?” 
Fans of the most successful musical ever created will fall in love with this striking “Phantom of the Opera” Monkey Figurine from the San Francisco Music Box Company! This ornate treasure depicts the famous monkey sitting atop a music box as it is sold at the opera house’s auction. And now you too can enjoy Raoul’s prized purchase. Revel in the nostalgia of “Phantom” as the delightful wind-up box twinkles the tune of “Masquerade” on its vintage 18-note mechanical player. The beautifully detailed monkey will crash his cymbals together as you listen to the charming music of the night. Hand sculpted and hand painted, this stunning statue makes the ideal gift idea for fans of the tragic tale. 

What’s in the Box? 
Licensed “Phantom of the Opera” monkey figurine 
Fully assembled classic mechanical music player 
Our appreciation for your purchase 
A “Phantom” fan’s wishes come true!

Specs & Details 
Measures 7” tall 
Measures 5” wide 
Weighs in at 1 pound 
No batteries required

How to Enjoy 
Gently wind up the mechanical turnkey 
Be entranced by the poignant “Masquerade” rendition
